annotation: The first of several outlines of biographical information that Tang Kristensen collected from Margrete.
danish_manuscript:
Margrete er nu i 82de Aar og gik og tog op
efter Medm i Høst i 7 halve og 3 hele
Dage og dernæst 1 dag et andet sted i
Kartofler og Roer i flere Dage Har 
ikke haft sygm fra hu var 7 Aar til det
andet Aar hu havde Influenza (78
Aar) undtagen en g. Kolden ryst hende
nogle faale gange.
english_manuscript: Margrete is now in her 82nd year and had gone and picked up after the men during the harvest for 7 half and three whole days and then 1 day another place with potatoes and beets for several days. Hadn't been sick since she was seven years old until the time she had influenza (78 years old), except for once she had some cold shivers a few times.
english_publication: Unpublished version reads: Margrete is now in her 82nd year and had gone and picked up after the men during the harvest for 7 half and three whole days and then 1 day another place with potatoes and beets for several days. Hadn’t been sick since she was seven years old until the time she had influenza (78 years old), except for once she had some cold shivers a few times.
